> 4 minutes ago, linuxgurugamer said:
> 
> 
> So nothing jumps out at me, other than wondering what's going on with AGM.
> 

It's the latest on <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> flagged for 1.5.1,  2.3.3.4 is marked as incompatible. It doesn't appear to cause any problems in-game so I have not investigated further.  

As for replicating it, I haven't used much AGM in this install (and not at all in the run the log is from) besides checking to make sure it works. In that log I'm pretty sure I didn't even open the menu, so the only reproduction step I can provide is "install the mod".

>

hmmm, that should be marked as compatible now.

Anyway, try installing the version I sent you, it's 2.2.4

Also, we are derailing this thread, would you mind moving the discussion over to the AGM thread?  I'm going to ask the mods to move the appropriate messages as well

This hasn't been officially updated.

The links in the forums are mostly to unofficial updates that won't appear on <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr>.

[https://spacedock.info/mod/2026/\[x\] science updated](https://spacedock.info/mod/2026/%5Bx%5D%20science%20updated)

I think that this is the continuation of this mod, but it has no thread in the Forum

> 
> 
> I think that this is the continuation of this mod, but it has no thread in the Forum

> On 12/30/2018 at 7:51 PM, BlackHat said:
> 
> 
> The current Mod Maintainer/Thread Author (Z-Key Aerospace) has not been on in a few months.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> But Flupster has been maintaining it in his place until he returns.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> But the new versions will NOT be available through <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr>. Because <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> can only point to Z-Key Aerospace's version.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Download the .zip for the version you want. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 1.5.1 - [https://github.com/Flupster/KSP-X-Science/releases/tag/5.18.1](https://github.com/Flupster/KSP-X-Science/releases/tag/5.18.1)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 1.6 - [https://github.com/Flupster/KSP-X-Science/releases/tag/5.19.0](https://github.com/Flupster/KSP-X-Science/releases/tag/5.19.0)
>

Would it be appropriate to point <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> to [@Flupster](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/192673-flupster/)'s version? It has been many months since this mod has been maintained otherwise. I don't mind making a pull request to NetKAN to make the update if that would be helpful, but I don't want to step on any toes or violate any community etiquette or anything.
ANY plans to update to 1.6.x?????
